eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base

Class SynchronizedTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.ForwardingTransaction
        • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.SynchronizedTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transaction

    final class SynchronizedTransaction
extends ForwardingTransaction
    A Transaction decorator handling operation synchronization and transaction auto-commit, auto-closure, maximum execution and idle times.

    This class intercept the start and end of each transaction operation to enforce five aspects:

    • Operation synchronization. At most one write operation can be active at any time, while multiple read operations can be active, provided no other write operation is pending. Synchronization is enforced using a read/write lock mechanism not tied to the thread currently executing an operation: this permits to terminate read operations when the returned iteration object is closed, perhaps in a different thread.
    • Auto-commit. Auto-commit is enforced by ending the transaction after the first issued operation completes; the class also makes sure that at most one operation is started in auto-commit mode.
    • Auto-closure. In auto-closure mode, the class ensures that closure is up-to-date before executing read operations (or write operations that also read data) that ask for forward reasoning. Also, closure is updated when the transaction ends.
    • Maximum execution and idle times. If specified at construction time, these time limits are enforced by scheduling a 'watchdog' object for periodic execution (using a supplied scheduler): each time it is activated, it checks whether timeout has occurred, and rolls back the transaction if it is the case.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SynchronizedTransaction

        public SynchronizedTransaction(Transaction delegate,
                       boolean writable,
                       boolean autoCommit,
                       boolean autoClosure,
                       @Nullable
                       SynchronizedTransaction.EndListener listener)
        Creates a new instance wrapping the transaction supplied, not enforcing maximum idle and execution times.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the wrapped transaction
        writable - true if the wrapped transaction is writable
        autoCommit - true if auto-commit must be enforced
        autoClosure - true if auto-closure must be enforced (transaction must be writable)
        listener - an optional listener notified when the transaction ends

      • SynchronizedTransaction

        public SynchronizedTransaction(Transaction delegate,
                       boolean writable,
                       boolean autoCommit,
                       boolean autoClosure,
                       @Nullable
                       SynchronizedTransaction.EndListener listener,
                       long maxExecutionTime,
                       long maxIdleTime,
                       ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
        Creates a new instance wrapping the transaction supplied and enforcing the maximum execution and idle times.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the wrapped transaction
        writable - true if the wrapped transaction is writable
        autoCommit - true if auto-commit must be enforced
        autoClosure - true if auto-closure must be enforced (transaction must be writable)
        listener - an optional listener notified when the transaction ends
        maxExecutionTime - the maximum transaction execution time, in ms, measured from the time this object is created; negative or zero if maximum execution time should not be checked
        maxIdleTime - the maximum transaction idle time, in ms, measured from the time this object is created or was busy in an operation; negative or zero if maximum idle time should not be checked
        scheduler - the scheduler object required to enforce max execution and idle times

    • Method Detail

      • delegate

        protected Transaction delegate()
        Returns the delegate transaction object set at construction time.
        Specified by:
        delegate in class ForwardingTransaction

      • startReadOperation

        private void startReadOperation(boolean closureNeeded)
                         throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Method called each time a read operation starts. The method performs three functions: (1) it checks whether the operation can be actually performed, based on the autoCommit property and transaction status, throwing an exception if execution is not possible; (2) it enforces proper operation synchronization, ensuring a read operation is not started if a write operation is in progress; and (3) it ensures the closure is up-to-date before starting the operation, if closureNeeded is true.
        Parameters:
        closureNeeded - true if closure must be up-to-date before starting the operation
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case closure update fails or the thread is interrupted while waiting to acquire a read lock

      • startWriteOperation

        private void startWriteOperation(boolean closureNeeded)
                          throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Method called each time a write operation starts. The method performs three functions: (1) it checks whether the operation can be actually performed, based on the autoCommit property and transaction status, throwing an exception if execution is not possible; (2) it enforces proper operation synchronization, ensuring the write operation starts when no other operation is in progress; and (3) it ensures the closure is up-to-date before starting the operation, if closureNeeded is true.
        Parameters:
        closureNeeded - true if closure must be up-to-date before starting the operation
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case closure update fails or the thread is interrupted while waiting to acquire a read lock

      • startOperationFailed

        private void startOperationFailed()
        Helper method that throws a suitable exception with an explaining message in case the start of an operation failed.

      • endReadOperation

        private void endReadOperation()
                       throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Method called each time a read operation ends. The method releases the shared read lock associated to the operation, performs auto-commit if required and updates the watchdog associated to the operation.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case auto-commit fails

      • endWriteOperation

        private void endWriteOperation(boolean operationSucceeded)
                        throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Method called each time a write operation ends. The method releases the exclusive lock associated to the operation, performs auto-commit if required and updates the watchdog associated to the operation.
        Parameters:
        operationSucceeded - in auto-commit mode, controls whether a commit or a rollback must occur
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case auto-commit fails

      • closeIterations

        private void closeIterations()
        Forces closure of all pending iterations.

      • wrap

        private <T> info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration<? extends T,org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException> wrap(info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration<? extends T,org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException> iteration)
        Method called each time an iteration is returned by the transaction. In case the transaction is ending/ended, the iteration is terminated immediately; otherwise (if outside an execute() call), the iteration is registered as pending and is wrapped so to be able to unregister it or force its termination when the transaction ends.
        Parameters:
        iteration - the intercepted iteration returned by the transaction
        Returns:
        the supplied iteration, when possible, or a wrapper of if

        Delegates to wrapped transaction. Executes as a write operation with no closure requirement (closure is deleted as part of the operation).
        Specified by:
        reset in interface Transaction
        Overrides:
        reset in class ForwardingTransaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

      • execute

        public <T,E extends Exception> T execute(Transaction.Operation<T,E> operation,
                                boolean writeOperation,
                                boolean closureNeeded)
          throws E extends Exception,
                 org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Delegates to wrapped transaction. Executes as a read or write operation, with or without closure requirements, depending on the parameters supplied.
        Specified by:

      • end

        public void end(boolean commit)
         throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Delegates to wrapped transaction. The method awaits for the termination of pending operation, forcing the closure of active iterations and preventing new iterations from being started. Closure is then updated if auto-closure is on, and the transaction is then ended by delegating. If an end listener was supplied at construction time, it is notified.
        Specified by:
        end in interface Transaction
        Overrides:
        end in class ForwardingTransaction
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
